pages.text: Will send you back to your bed, respawn anchor, or spawn on use.

pages.title: Thousand Curses
pages.text: Gives you stronger and stronger bonuses the more curses your armors have.

pages.title: Bloodstained Valor
pages.text: Gives you more damage, speed, and resistance the more health you are missing.
Can turn guardians neutral towards the user and can be used to enrage monsters.
$(o)$(5)On the path to take it all away... $()$(br2)This book alters the fourth curse when used.
If you die in the nether in a big enough pool of lava, it will cause the Ring of the Seven Curses to be destroyed. $(o)$(c)But why would you want that????
Significantly improves your enchanting ability, although you can get curses and treasure enchantments while enchanting...
Renders Piglins neutral towards you, disregarding the second curse. Piglin and Villager are now more beneficial.
Extinguishes you while on fire. Can block piercing objects and cannot be disabled.
Gives you an extra permanent ring slot when eaten. You can only gain one ring slot total from this fruit even if you eat more.
Deals extreme damage to endermen and disables the teleportation of endermen and shulkers. Also disables a number of teleportation items when attacking players.

pages.title: Tome of Malignancy
pages.text: Can transfer curses onto this book from other items.

pages.title: Wayfinder
pages.text: Points to the nearest soul crystal.

pages.title: Sacrifices
pages.text: The Items past this point require an even greater sacrifice. You must wear the Ring of the Seven Curses for 99.5% of your existence.

pages.title: Burden of Desolation
pages.text: Disables the spawning of Iron Golems, Piglins, Zombie Piglins and Endermen around you.

pages.title: Testament of Contempt
pages.text: After death, your inventory will remain with you. You will still lose experience and a soul crystal like normal.
